name: adidas Forum Low Bad Bunny Pink Easter Egg
description: Releasing in April 2021, the Bad Bunny x Forum Buckle Low 'Easter Egg' released as the second collaboration with the rapper. Built with a mix of leather and suede, the shoe's upper appears in Icey Pink, Blush and Trace Pink. The retro basketball shoe has been updated with an adjustable ankle strap and two tongues, which feature Bad Bunny's third-eye logo. Perforations on the toe box and quarter panel are included for breathability, while underfoot, a semitranslucent rubber cupsole anchors the build.
